resources.string: For the first time in the cinematic history of Spider-Man, our friendly neighborhood hero is unmasked
From Warner Bros. Pictures comes "The Batman," with director Matt Reeves (the "Planet of the Apes" films)
The Bad Guys, In the new action comedy from DreamWorks Animation, based on the New York Times best-selling book series
AMBULANCE, Over one day across the streets of L.A., three lives will change forever
